summary: This document contains an email exchange between Jes Staley and Jeffrey Epstein. Staley mentions missing a cocktail party and indicates he will call Epstein the following morning. The email reflects their communication and connection.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is communicating with Jeffrey Epstein regarding a missed cocktail party and plans to call him the next morning.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is responding to Jes Staley's email, indicating he is in the office for another 40 minutes.

connections.description: Jes Staley and Jeffrey Epstein are communicating about social events, indicating a personal connection.

keyFacts: The email exchange took place on June 25, 2009.
Jes Staley mentioned missing a cocktail party hosted by him.
Jeffrey Epstein indicated he was in the office for another 40 minutes during the email exchange.
